  • Method Details

    • register

      public boolean register(String username, String password) throws InvalidUserNameException, InvalidPasswordException, RegistrationFailedException
      Registers a user to the system with 'username' and 'password'
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user
      password - password of the user
      Returns:
      true if registration was succesfull, false if not
      Throws:
      RegistrationFailedException - if registration failed due to an IO Error
      InvalidUserNameException - if username is blank, has whitespace or a user with the same name already exists
      InvalidPasswordException - if the psasword is blank has whitespace or has less than 8 characters

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password) throws LoginFailedException
      Tries to log in to the user with 'username' and 'password'

      If login succeds the mainFrame will be initialized and set visible

      Parameters:
      username - username of the user
      password - password of the user
      Returns:
      true if login was succesfull, false if not
      Throws:
      LoginFailedException - if user with username does not exist or passwords don't match

    • getLoginView

      public FrameView getLoginView()
      Returns a LoginWindow where the user can log in to their account or register a new account
      Returns:
      a LoginWindow

    • userExists

      private boolean userExists(String username)
      Checks if the save file has a record with the username
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      true if user exists

    • usernameIsInvalid

      private boolean usernameIsInvalid(String username)
      Checks if username is invalid

      A username is invalid if it's blank or contains white spaces

      Parameters:
      username - the username that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      true if username is blank or contains white spaces, false otherwise

    • passwordIsInvalid

      private boolean passwordIsInvalid(String password)
      Checks if password is invalid

      A password is invalid if it's blank or contains white spaces or has less than 8 characters

      Parameters:
      password - the password that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      true if password is blank or contains white spaces or has less than 8 characters, false otherwise

    • findUser

      public User findUser(String username) throws UserNotFound
      Finds a user with a specific username
      Parameters:
      username - the username the user has
      Returns:
      the user with the username
      Throws:
      UserNotFound - if user was not found due to an IO Error or user does not exist
